meanings.definition: A marine invertebrate animal of the class Ascidiacea, characterized by a sac-like body with two siphons for drawing in and expelling water.
meanings.sent1: The ascidians in the ocean have sac-like bodies.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study ascidians to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The ascidians had a water party in their sac-like home.
meanings.sent4: The ascidians are like tiny water balloons in the sea.
meanings.sent5: Children love to watch ascidians squirt water out of their siphons.

meanings.definition: A member of the class Ascidiacea, which includes sea squirts and tunicates.
meanings.sent2: The aquarium has a tank dedicated to showcasing ascidians.
meanings.sent3: The ascidians had a secret meeting with the sea squirts.
meanings.sent4: In the underwater world, ascidians are like the royalty of the sea squirts.
meanings.sent5: The tunicates and ascidians swam gracefully together in the ocean.
